SELECT n.`id`, n.`nama`, k.`nama` jns_kelamin, s.`status` sts_sipil, n.`domisili`, n.`alamat`, n.`telepon`, a.`nama` agent, p.`nama` perusahaan, b.nama `bank`, n.`bagian`, n.`no_rek`, n.`tgl_masuk`, n.`tgl_payroll`, w.`status` `sts_krywn`, g.jenis `jns_anggota`, t.`status` `sts_anggota`, n.`no_rek_ref`, n.`nama_ref`, n.`keterangan`, n.`is_agent`, n.`deleted`, n.`created_by`, n.`created_time` FROM ms_nasabah_hist n INNER JOIN ms_jns_kelamin k ON k.id = n.jns_kelamin_id INNER JOIN ms_sts_sipil s ON s.id = n.sts_sipil_id INNER JOIN ms_nasabah a ON a.id = n.agent_id INNER JOIN ms_perusahaan p ON p.id = n.perusahaan_id INNER JOIN ms_sts_krywn w ON w.id = n.sts_krywn_id INNER JOIN ms_bank b ON b.id = n.bank_id INNER JOIN ms_jns_anggota g ON g.id = n.jns_anggota_id INNER JOIN ms_sts_anggota t ON t.id = n.sts_anggota_id WHERE n.deleted = 0 AND n.id = #value#
